channel.title: Newbie here, Help me please
channel.description:
Ok, so ive been hoping through threads on how to create a server. And the only programs I have right now is moparscape and Hamachi. Is there any programs that I would need to make a server? Basicly I know how to connect people to my server,I just need a way to edit monsters,items,NPCs,character and things like that.I've been venturing into my moparscape folder the only thing ive found was how to edit a shop and change my characters stats."Classes Modified: Possibly client.java, item.java, item2.java, npchandler.java ,shophandler.java, playerhandler.java, and server.java.", where can I even find these files? Is these person using morapscape? I'f not could someone lead me to a link for what they are talking about? Well I'm sure most of you have been in my position. So please help me out. :(
Thank you, Chris

item.title: Newbie here, Help me please
item.dc:creator: @bryan_cole1 bryan cole1
item.description:
@bryan_cole1 wrote:

Mr. Wood:

Ok, thanks I have notepad, Could you possible post some links to the others?

download winrar from this, if you download winrar you don’t have to download winzip. http://rarlab.com

Read full topic

item.title: Newbie here, Help me please
item.dc:creator: @CoolCombat_Kid CoolCombat Kid
item.description:
@CoolCombat_Kid wrote:

well…I think most of the Sources have been Deleted on Mopar Forums…but I still have a Copy of TestScape Source for Beginners![br][size=1]Posted on: January 28, 2007, 08:08:29 AM[/size][hr]If you would like me to Send a Copy of TestScape Source then make an MSN or Add my MSN and ill send you it.
HaloCinema@hotmail.co.uk[br][size=1]Posted on: January 28, 2007, 08:11:08 AM[/size][hr]Oh…and i forgot to tell you that im NOT going to be Watching this Thread so if you have any other questions then PM Me or Add my MSN.
HaloCinema@hotmail.co.uk

Read full topic

you have to refer to the moparscape server development section and tutorials for help with coding

item.title: Newbie here, Help me please

item.description:
@Mr_Wood wrote:

Ok, so ive been hoping through threads on how to create a server. And the only programs I have right now is moparscape and Hamachi. Is there any programs that I would need to make a server? Basicly I know how to connect people to my server,I just need a way to edit monsters,items,NPCs,character and things like that.I’ve been venturing into my moparscape folder the only thing ive found was how to edit a shop and change my characters stats.“Classes Modified: Possibly client.java, item.java, item2.java, npchandler.java ,shophandler.java, playerhandler.java, and server.java.”, where can I even find these files? Is these person using morapscape? I’f not could someone lead me to a link for what they are talking about? Well I’m sure most of you have been in my position. So please help me out.
